H0.text: Which former Italian Prime Minister was kidnapped by The Red Brigade in 1978, and killed after 55 days in captivity. Giulio Andreotti

H1.text: Which former Italian Prime Minister was kidnapped by The Red Brigade in 1978, and killed after 55 days in captivity. Bettino Craxi

H2.text: Which former Italian Prime Minister was kidnapped by The Red Brigade in 1978, and killed after 55 days in captivity. Amintore Fanfani

H3.text: Which former Italian Prime Minister was kidnapped by The Red Brigade in 1978, and killed after 55 days in captivity. Aldo Moro

A4.text: On 16 March 1978, Aldo Moro was kidnapped by the Red Brigades and killed after 55 days of captivity.

A5.text: Moro was one of Italy's longest-serving post-war prime ministers, leading the country for more than six years.
